title: New Creator: imrobvoice
body:
Name: imrobvoice

Socials: https://twitter.com/imrobvoice

Info: To deepen understanding and execution of creator coin integrations, and support the ongoing growth of Rally's event marketing strategy, Rally BD would like to launch a coin for Rob. This coin will be used primarily for new use cases and proving out interactive content formats. Rob's content mix will have a heavy emphasis on spotlighting the Rally platform and its creators with podcasts, talk shows, competitions and co-streaming sessions.

Uses
Launch - Rob will host wagers and competitions with gamers and musicians on Twitch where fans and players win $VOICE coins.
Hodl - Holders of $VOICE will get weighted voting power in live interaction shows, as well as prioritized submissions for AMAs.
Spend - Rob will host ASMR streams and take requests in $VOICE coin, as well as host tournaments with buy-in exclusively in the coin. Coins will also be used for voting in charity drives and choosing games for co-streams.

Coin grant: $0 

A 'yes' will approve this proposal and $VOICE coin
A 'no' will deny this proposal
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
